  • Uses of KeyPartitioner in org.infinispan.distribution.ch.impl

    Classes in org.infinispan.distribution.ch.impl that implement KeyPartitioner
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AffinityPartitioner
    Key partitioner that maps keys to segments using information contained in AffinityTaggedKey.
    class 
    HashFunctionPartitioner
    Key partitioner that computes a key's segment based on a hash function.
    class 
    RESPHashFunctionPartitioner
    Implementation of HashFunctionPartitioner using CRC16 for use with RESP.
    class 
    SingleSegmentKeyPartitioner
    KeyPartitioner that always returns 0 for a given segment.
